All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AccountController
Controller class responsible for managing the user's account view.
AIManager
A singleton object used as a manager for all AI requests.
CreateAccController
the JavaFX controller for creating a new account
DatabaseConnection
A class to return an instance of an sqlite database connection.
FileManager
Class used to Manage uploading files for the summarizing
Folder
A model of a folder object for database integration
HelloApplication
The main application class, running main and starting the JavaFX thread
HelloController
A controller for the welcome and terms and conditions screen
LoginController
Controller class for handling user login and account creation navigation.
MainController
Controller Class responsible for the main view
NavigationUI
An abstract class which handles the Navigation Bar functions for the Controller Classes
NewQuizController
JavaFX controller for creating new quiz page.
Note
A note object for database integration
NotePageDAO
The Data Access Object is used for handling the CRUD operations on folders and notes.
NoteSummaryDAO
Data Access Object Class used to save a Note Summary on the summary-view
QuizController
Controller class for managing the quiz view interface.
QuizDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing quiz data including creation, retrieval, and deletion of quizzes and their questions from the database.
QuizMultipleChoiceQuestion
A class to store and give ability to randomize multiple choice quiz questions.
QuizQuestion
A class to hold a variable response QuizQuestion
QuizResponse
A Class holding an entire quiz
SummaryAlert
Class that handles summary alert for Summary Controller
SummaryController
Controller Class responsible for the summary view
SummaryResponse
A model class for summary responses from the AI fetcher, with aditional user input included
TheNotePageController
TheNotePageController controller manages the multiple functions such as the creating, deleting, and saving of notes.
UserAccount
Singleton class representing the currently logged-in user.
UserAccountDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing user accounts in the database.
